common.writeMessagePrompt: Write a message and send it to talk with our AI agent.

hero.title: Learn AIs Implementation from the Educator Actually Using It Across Multiple Businesses
hero.description: I'm Frank Sellingsloh, and I've been implementing AI across my education, hospitality, and career services companies since day 5 of ChatGPT. Now I teach the exact strategies that transformed my operations—and I do it the way I've been teaching for 20+ years: through practical, hands-on courses.
hero.credentials: 25+ years of digital transformation experience • 3 companies, 7+ brands • 100s of successful AI implementations

forEducators.description: 5-day professional development • Teaching enhancement • Administrative automation • Student engagement

caseStudies.title: REAL IMPLEMENTATIONS

caseStudies.description: These aren't case studies from other companies—they're active AI implementations across my businesses.

proven.title: Proven Teaching

team.title: Team Collaboration

about.title: About Frank
about.subtitle: Your AI Guide
about.description: I'm Frank Sellingsloh, obsessed with AI since day 5 of ChatGPT's release. My credential isn't early adoption—it's successful implementation across multiple real businesses.
about.backgroundText: 25+ years digital transformation • Erasmus+ coordinator since 2004 • CEO/Co-founder of 6+ companies
about.approachText: I generate AI strategies and concepts, my team handles development. You learn both creative thinking and practical execution.
about.promiseText: Every strategy I teach has been tested in my own businesses.
